typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string,
		source as string,
		UniqueCustomerID as string,
		CreatedDate_Tr as date,
		UpdatedDate_Tr as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[('*.snappy.parquet')]) ~> CustomerDataSource
source(output(
		CustomerSK as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		RecordStartDate as date,
		RecordEndDate as date,
		ActiveFlag as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> CustomerDatabase
CustomerDataSource, CustomerDatabase exists(UniqueCustomerID == CustomerDatabase@CustomerID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Select1, CustomerDataSource lookup(CustomerIDNew == CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CustomerLookup
Exists select(mapColumn(
		CustomerIDNew = CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		source,
		UniqueCustomerID,
		CreatedDate_Tr,
		UpdatedDate_Tr
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
CustomerLookup sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CustomerSK as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		RecordStartDate as date,
		RecordEndDate as date,
		ActiveFlag as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SynapseCustomerSink
